properties.name: br.com.jasf.microservicechallenge.exchange
properties.description: Name of the RabbitMQ queue for the validation service response

properties.name: br.com.jasf.microservicechallenge.routing-key
properties.description: Routing key for the validation response

properties.name: br.com.jasf.microservicechallenge.insertion-queue
properties.description: Name of the RabbitMQ queue for the insertion service

properties.name: br.com.jasf.microservicechallenge.validation-queue
properties.description: Name of the RabbitMQ queue for the validation service

properties.name: br.com.jasf.microservicechallenge.validation-consumers
properties.description: Number of validation consumers on the validation service

properties.name: br.com.jasf.microservicechallenge.insertion-consumers
properties.description: Number of insertion consumers on the insertion service

properties.name: br.com.jasf.microservicechallenge.failure.num-retries
properties.description: Number of retries on connection failure (Rabbit and Database)

properties.name: br.com.jasf.microservicechallenge.failure.interval
properties.description: Interval between retries on connection failure (Rabbit and Database)
